item.title: Sticky Menus and Mega Drop Down Menus
item.description: There are time when UX best practices for the web don’t always provide the best experience for the users of a website. One example would be Sticky Menus and Mega Drop Down Menus. A Sticky Menu is a navigation bar that is stuck to the top of the screen when scrolling, usually with position:fixed;top:0; set on the menu itself. This ensures that no matter how far the user scrolls on the page, the site’s navigation is always available to the user without having to scroll to the top of the page.
